definition: to make a supreme effort/at all costs

sentences.english: The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察还极力敦促他尽快将女儿的遗体火化，陈广干说。

sentences.english: The tradesman was vigorously soliciting for my custom.
sentences.chinese: 那个店主极力向我拉生意。

sentences.english: I managed to bung up the hole in the ceiling with some paper.
sentences.chinese: 我用一些纸极力把天花板的洞塞住。

sentences.english: The contemporary art esteems vigorously which by US occupies the mainstream status forcefully.
sentences.chinese: 由美国极力推崇的当代艺术强行占据主流地位。

sentences.english: We strongly support education in our own mother tongues.
sentences.chinese: 极力支持争取接受母语方言教育的权利。

sentences.english: We must fight the urge to revamp our diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须极力修补我们的外交关系。

sentences.english: The boy plays up his strong points and minimizes his weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩夸大自己的长处，极力缩小自己的缺点。

sentences.english: If you pursue an end, you enchain yourself.
sentences.chinese: 若你极力追求某种目的，你只会束缚了自己。

sentences.english: The candidates all pandered to Michigan's biggest special interest.
sentences.chinese: 所有的竞选者都围绕密西根最大的利益焦点极力逢迎。

sentences.english: There seemed no end to the hidden enemies at whom he raved .
sentences.chinese: 他极力反对的隐蔽的敌人似乎还没有停止活动。

sentences.english: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.chinese: 她极力向我推荐她的劣质雪利酒。

sentences.english: I too but signify at the utmost a little wash'd-up drift.
sentences.chinese: 我只不过极力表白一些刷岸的吹积。

sentences.english: Mr Schapiro is a campaigner for tougher regulation of American business.
sentences.chinese: 斯加皮罗极力推行美国商业使用更为严厉的规章制度。

sentences.english: While the international community tried mediation, but the horse still unresolved political crisis.
sentences.chinese: 尽管国际社会极力斡旋，但马政治危机仍未解决。

sentences.english: Milton's taking pains here, and he does this with very few other poems, to let us know precisely when it is that he's written it.
sentences.chinese: 弥尔顿在这里极力想让我们，知道他确切的创作时间。

sentences.english: They urged that the library be kept open during the vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他们极力主张在放假期间图书馆应当照常开放。

definition: to do one's utmost/with all one's might/at all costs/(to work or fight) as if one's life depends on it
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means/to try this, that and the other
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
lit. thousand ways, a hundred plans (idiom); by every possible means
